item.title: NodeJS 沙盒技术一览
item.description: Module Secure Memory Limits Isolated Multithreaded Module Support Inspector Support vm ✅ ✅ worker_threads ✅ ✅ ✅ vm2 ✅ ✅ ✅ napajs ✅ ✅ Partial webworker-threads ✅ ✅ tiny-worker ✅ ✅ isolated-vm ✅ ✅ ✅ ✅ ✅ Secure: Safely run untrusted code Memory Limits: Possible to set memory limits / safe against heap overflow DoS attacks Isolated: Is garbage collection, heap, etc isolated from application Multithreaded: Run code on many
